text: James L. Harris was a college football player for the Sewanee Tigers football team. As of 1949, he was living in New Orleans.https://archive.org/stream/sewaneealumninew15univ#page/n13/mode/2up/search/Cope He played as a tackle and a running back. He was selected All-Southern in 1908. ==References== Category:American football running backs Category:American football tackles Category:Sewanee Tigers football players
title: James L. Harris (American football)
